main event: On several different nights, observers sighted a bright glowing object that maneuvered quickly and silently in the sky over Marblehead, Ohio.
interesting points: The object appeared to have a glowing, balloon-like shape.
The object made no sound as it moved.
Other observers in the area reported similar sightings of the object.
The object was visible for about 1-2 minutes at a time before disappearing.
The object appeared to be at a considerable distance and altitude.
